REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f3260 reute d f BC-DOW-<DOW>-SETS-GROUND 03-16 0060

TEXT.TITLE: DOW <DOW> SETS GROUNDWATER POLLUTION VENTURE
TEXT.BODY: Dow Chemical Co, <Guy F. Atkinson Co> and <Woodward-Clyde Consultants> said they formed a venture to combat groundwater contamination. The venture, called AWD Technologies Inc, will offer site analysis, planning, engineering and construction services for restoration of groundwater. Reuter
